actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the Sunday following Fire Service Recognition Day as Memorial Sunday for fire fighters who have been disabled or killed in the line of duty during the preceding year.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to annually designate the Sunday following Fire Service Recognition Day as "Memorial Sunday" for firefighters disabled or killed in the line of duty during the preceeding year.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the Sunday following Fire Service Recognition Day as Memorial Sunday for fire fighters who have been disabled or killed in the line of duty during the preceding year.
